website_summaries.verdict: The $30 Boogie Board Jot 8.5 is a fun-to-use writing tablet that lets you save notes and drawings to your phone or tablet.
pros: Allows you to easily draw and erase pictures
cons: Scanning function is difficult to use

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my shopping list mainly. I used to have an old Boogie board but unfortunately the battery died and you could not renew it. This time I bought a cheaper version from another supplier but it was so inferior that I could hardly see what I had written. I returned that and bought this Boogie board which is perfect for the job and you can change the battery.
customer_reviews.author: rosiebakewell

customer_reviews.title: Very poor
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disappointing my 8 year old daughter begged for one of these i payed the asking price which i believe u pay for good quality so paying this And received it today and already it doesnt erase after using it she's so disappointed and so am i for what i payed for it it was a waste of money and i have an upset child and a boogie board that is no use i wouldn't recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: maria parsons

customer_reviews.title: Cannot replace battery that only lasts a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item on recommendation. It was for my elderly aunt who has motor neurones and can't speak well. It worked brilliantly for a few weeks. It stopped clearing the screen and changing the battery didn't work. I returned it and got a replacement straight away. This one lasted longer (2 months almost ) it has now gone the same way but is now over the time to return the product. My aunt is not using the boogie board all the time. Only for visitors. So item doesn't last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I normally take some time before writing reviews about a ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally take some time before writing reviews about a product. I bought this product in august 2016 and i though to use it for 6 months and then share my thoughts. I bought this thinking its a made in USA product but its made in China(on offense but my experience with cheap made in China products are not good).You know what, it stopped working :( . I changed the battery but still not working.The build quality is poor(specially at this price range) and you can feel and smell the plastic in you hand. I have asked help from boogie board support team but still waiting for their response. Lets see...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: marking very easily, which a pain since it has no protection ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mum in hospital following cancer surgery and unable to speak. Gadget is very flimsy and sensitive, marking very easily, which a pain since it has no protection cover. Individual words cannot be erased, so have to be crossed through. Lasted 3 days then completely conked out. For a glorified child's magnetic board, it was definitely not worth the money. Mum ended up with good old pen and paper.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend buying it at all
